name: Song of the Spirit (JamCraft Edition)
description:
You can find the rules, recipes and advice on our official Song of the Spirit Guide: 

https://www.eisenstadtstudio.com/projects/song_of_a_spirit/

Song of the spirits has started out as a JamCraft 3 Game submission by Miles Thatch (TheConceptBoy). The goal of the game is to explore the magic of creating music without being bound by a need to know music theory, notation and the 2 dimensions of song writing Craft whimsical sounds, from the resources and explore routing and trigger posts to create an elaborate sound-scape of your own.
